tier.item: b. Verlustig geht ihnen damit auch die Kontrolle über Geldmenge,
lost goes them that.with also the control over money.amount
Inflation und Zinsen.21 , 22
inflation and interest
In the main text of (Heringer, 1973:93).
Note that freikommen is not a resultative construction, since freikommen does not mean that
the coming of an individual (kommen) causes the individual to be free (frei). See for instance
Dowty (1979) on the meaning of resultative constructions.
`With that they also lose control over the sums of money, inflation and
interest.'

the coming of an individual (kommen) causes the individual to be free (frei). See for instance

See also Uszkoreit (1987:100) for the observation that many particle frontings are better when
the verb is in second position, i.e., adjacent to the particle.
The examples in (25) are from (Uszkoreit, 1987:107).

motorists, but rather those of the economy.'

under the table falls that those critics less the interests of.the

car.drivers but much more those of.the industry look.after
See also Uszkoreit (1987:100) for the observation that many particle frontings are better when
the verb is in second position, i.e., adjacent to the particle.
The examples in (25) are from (Uszkoreit, 1987:107).
`It is not mentioned that these critics do not represent the interests of
motorists, but rather those of the economy.'
Unter den Tisch fällt, dass diese Kritiker weniger die Interessen der Autofahrer, sondern viel mehr die der Wirtschaft vertreten.34
under the table falls that those critics less the interests of.the car.drivers but much more those of.the industry look.after
See also Uszkoreit (1987:100) for the observation that many particle frontings are better when
the verb is in second position, i.e., adjacent to the particle.
The examples in (25) are from (Uszkoreit, 1987:107).
It is not mentioned that these critics do not represent the interests of motorists, but rather those of the economy.

tier.item: b. Ein schlechtes Licht wirft die Bilanz auf den Osten der Stadt:
